name: Silent Swords
description:
Silent Swords is a stealth action game designed exclusively for the iPhone and iPod Touch. The legend begins, be a part of it!

“Patience is a virtue,” his sensei had taught him, so the little black ninja waited patiently for the right moment. And the right moment came. That poor guard never knew what hit him. Our hero has become just another shadow among shadows. With the Silent Swords back in his hands, the filthy walls won't hold him for much longer...

--- FEATURES ---

· True stealth action at your fingertips!

· Avoid the lights and become invisible in the shadows

· Wide selection of controls: use iPhone-specific controls (shake to jump, tap repeatedly to control how fast you move) or more standard ones (analog stick to move, button to jump)

· Dispatch nearby enemies using gesture-driven sword attacks

· Throw shurikens to knock down enemies before they notice you

· Use your environment for camouflage

· New levels to unlock once you complete the game

--- NEW IN 1.2 ---

· Unlockable Christmas level
· More control options (now includes "analog stick" control)
· Cool new icon :)

--- NEW IN 1.1 ---

· Alternative control options: tap and hold to walk, double-tap and hold to run
· 5 new unlockable levels!
